original_text: I looked, and there before me was a white cloud, and seated on the cloud was one like a son of man with a crown of gold on his head and a sharp sickle in his hand.
korean_text: 또 내가 보니 흰 구름이 있고 구름 위에 인자와 같은 이가 앉으셨는데 그 머리에는 금 면류관이 있고 그 손에는 예리한 낫을 가졌더라

sentences.original_text: and there before me was a white cloud
and seated on the cloud was one like a son of man
sentences.korean_translation: 그 구름에 앉은 이는 인자 같은 이가 있었는데

sentences.original_text: with a crown of gold on his head
and a sharp sickle in his hand
